stories.text:
Clever people of HN, please provide your feedback.

I recently left a startup where I was issued NSOs over 2.5 years of working with them. This made up part of my salary.

After leaving I have 3 months to purchase the options.

Prior to leaving I tried to purchase the options and was told the window was closed, I have followed up again and have received no feedback just yet, I assume the window is still closed. Before leaving i received clarification that the window being closed would not lengthen the period I had to purchase.

What can I do if the window is closed through the duration of the 3 months after leaving? Do I have any leg to stand on?
stories.title: NSOs – After Leaving Employment
